page.title: 14SWAFFHAM PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The church of S.S. Peter & Paul is of considerable historical interest, particularly in relation to its associations with the legend of the Pedlar of Swaffham. The maintainance of the fabric of the church places a heavy burden on the congregation but the current appeal for Â£20,000 for the restoration of the vestry is being met. The groups within the church cater for 3-16 year olds through Sunday School and Pathfinder groups, whilst the needs of the many older members are met through coffee mornings, prayer groups and lay visits. The Parish Church Rooms, formerly the National School, provides a venue for these groups.
